channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-39208|2024-09-26T14:11:34.888Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.15.10 may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-08-02T00:27:59.871Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-06-04T17:46:27.448Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.
